participant_1.background:
I'm secretly worried that my grocery store won't be successful.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
i live in a suburb of boston.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
i love to go to the lake.

participant_2.background:
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.
I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
we are getting married in a park.
I am grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.
i like football.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Pretty good! I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Same here! I'm going to treat my mom to her favorite fast food as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
That's so sweet! I'm sure she'll love that.
Thanks! I'm also grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for her when she needs me.
That's great to hear. It sounds like you have a lot to be thankful for.
I do! And I'm also excited to get married in a park this summer.
That sounds lovely! I hope you have a beautiful wedding.
Thank you! I'm sure it will be great.
What are you doing to prepare for the wedding?
I'm meeting with vendors, booking venues, and coordinating everything. It's a lot of work, but it's also really exciting.
It sounds like it! I'm sure it will all be worth it in the end.
I know it will! Thanks for talking to me about it.
Of course! It was nice chatting with you.
You too! Have a great weekend!
